mdRecord.dcterms:description: Main facade entrance showing tile decoration

The site's main plant was constructed in 1927 for the Royal Laundry Company, a laundry service founded in 1910. The plant's south annex, a Streamline Moderne building topped by a pylon, was added to the complex around 1930. An additional building providing drive-up service was constructed in 1939.... -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Royal_Laundry_Complex [work]
